name: Shoot Before (Forest Edition)
description:
Hey Awesome people, if you want to play a game with great fps mechanics, with tons of great animations like reloading, inspecting here you are!

Shoot Before (Forest Edition) gives you an awesome experience of playing a game for you inner gamer! 

Features -

Many Animations- Walking, Running, Shooting, Reloading, Inspecting, etc.

Target System.

Explosions!

Beautiful Graphics

Among Many other features.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls - 

WASD to move

Right Click to shoot

Left Click to use the scope

Scroll to change weapons

(Tip - use tab in the game to show full controls)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Make Sure to join our discord for more updates on this game!

Discord - https:/discord.gg/qh8A2dXCBS

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made using -

Unity

Low poly fps pack unity asset (Free)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Thanks For playing the game make sure to leave a comment or join our discord server and give a review!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you find any bugs feel free to leave a message in our discord server!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
